name: Rep. Tom O'Halleran
tweet_text: Jan 6 showed us the power that lies & division can truly have. But, as we reflect on the pain of this dark day, we must also think of the strength of what our nation can be—the unity we can work to rebuild in our own communities that will create a wholly less divided America. 3/4

name: Rep. Tom O'Halleran
tweet_text: That fear was what I remembered most clearly when we learned later that an officer was lost to the violence of the day & 4 more to suicide later, w/ 140 suffering physical injuries & far more from injuries invisible. The numbers are unbelievable, unacceptable. 2/4

name: Rep. Tom O'Halleran
tweet_text: Of my memories of 1/6, none has endured so vividly as the fear I saw in our officers’ eyes. As a former police officer, I’ve felt fear myself. The men & women sworn to protect & serve the Capitol, members, & staff were being brutally beaten while they acted to keep us safe. 1/4

name: Rep. Tom O'Halleran
